item.description:
What: Booze for Boobies - Jen's Breast Cancer Fundraiser

When: August 8, 2009 7:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Where: District Restaurant and Lounge

There are two ticket options:

Option 1: VIP tickets are $35 and will include access to the VIP Hors D'Oeuvre Reception, Your Choice of Delectable Martini, 2 complimentary raffle tickets, cut the line access with your PayPal receipt, and guaranteed admission. To take advantage of the VIP ticket option, please go here: http://bit.ly/boozefo...

Option 2: General admission will be $10 and include one raffle ticket - these are purchased @ the door

Additional raffle tickets available for purchase: 1 for $5, 3 for $10 and 10 for $20. Prizes to be raffled off throughout the night total over $3,700!!! (Local area attractions, restaurants, spas/salons, makeup manufacturers, etc)

Money raised during this fundraiser will benefit the Susan G. Komen and the National Philanthropic Trust Breast Cancer Fund via Jen Hammel's 3-Day Walk for breast cancer in DC October 9-11th

After the fundraiser, meetup attendees can stay and party at District!

If you have any questions, please email Jen at lyndasladies@gmail.com
item.name: Booze for Boobies - Jen's Breast Cancer Fundraiser at the District Lounge
